p: This page can't be saved. If you leave this page before pressing submit any changes you have made will be lost.

globalErrorMsgs.wordTooLong: Single words must be fewer than 59 characters

patientName.label: Full name
patientName.pattern: Patient's name can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens, apostrophes and full stops
patientName.endCharInvalid: The last character of your patient's name must be an alphabetic character
patientName.specialChar: Patient's name containing hyphens and apostrophes must have alphabetical characters on either side. For example O'Neil
patientName.wordTooLong: Patient's name must contain words with fewer than 59 characters
patientName.wordTooShort: The patient's name must be more than 1 character
patientName.lastWordTooLong: The patient's last name must be 35 characters or fewer
patientName.firstWordTooLong: The patient's first names must be 58 characters or fewer
patientName.firstLastTooLong: The patient's last name must be 35 characters or fewer. First names must be 58 characters or fewer

patientPostcode.label: Postcode
patientPostcode.tooLong: Your patient's postcode has a maximum length of 8 characters. Please only include alphabetical and numeric characters and avoid spaces and hyphens

patientDateOfBirth.label: Date of birth
patientDateOfBirth.empty: Enter your patient's date of birth
patientDateOfBirth.empty[MMYY]: Your patient's date of birth must include a month and a year
patientDateOfBirth.empty[DDYY]: Your patient's date of birth must include a day and a year
patientDateOfBirth.empty[DDMM]: Your patient's date of birth must include a day and month
patientDateOfBirth.invalid: The day is not possible for the selected month
patientDateOfBirth.future: Date of birth must be in the past
patientDateOfBirth.rangePast: Date of birth must be after 1 January 1890
patientDateOfBirth.isNumeric: Your patient's date of birth should contain only numbers 0-9. Please avoid any hyphens, slashes or spaces.
patientDateOfBirth.range: Day must be between 1-31, Month must be between 1-12, Year must be between 1890-present
patientDateOfBirth.range[DDMM]: Day must be between 1-31, Month must be between 1-12
patientDateOfBirth.range[DDYY]: Day must be between 1-31, Year must be between 1890-present
patientDateOfBirth.range[MMYY]: Month must be between 1-12, Year must be between 1890-present
patientDateOfBirth.tooLong: Date of birth must not exceed 8 characters

patientDateOfBirth[dd].empty: Enter your patient's day of birth

patientDateOfBirth[mm].empty: Your patient's date of birth must contain a month

patientDateOfBirth[yyyy].empty: Your patient's date of birth must contain a year

patientNino.label: National Insurance number
patientNino.hint: (This form is processed quicker if you have it)
patientNino.pattern: National Insurance number is not a valid format
patientNino.invalid: Enter a National Insurance number that is 2 letters, 6 numbers, then A, B, C or D, like QQ123456C

diagnosis.ariaLabel: Enter details of the patient’s main diagnosis
diagnosis.label: Include details of the patient’s main diagnosis, and any others that are relevant
diagnosis.labelA11y: Details of the patient’s main diagnosis
diagnosis.tooLong: Your patient's diagnosis has a maximum length of 126 characters
diagnosis.wordTooLong: Diagnosis must contain words with fewer than 59 characters

dateOfDiagnosis.label: Date of diagnosis
dateOfDiagnosis.empty: Enter your patient's date of diagnosis
dateOfDiagnosis.future: Patient's date of diagnosis must be in the past
dateOfDiagnosis.beforeDob: Patient's date of diagnosis must be between date of birth and today
dateOfDiagnosis.invalid: Patient's date of diagnosis must be a real date
dateOfDiagnosis.isNumeric: Date of diagnosis should contain only numbers 0-9. Please avoid any hyphens, slashes or spaces
dateOfDiagnosis.range: Month must be between 1-12, Year must be between 1890-present

dateOfDiagnosis[dd].ariaLabel: Enter day of patient's date of diagnosis
dateOfDiagnosis[dd].empty: Enter day of your patient's diagnosis

dateOfDiagnosis[mm].ariaLabel: Enter month of the patient’s date of diagnosis
dateOfDiagnosis[mm].empty: Enter your patient's month of diagnosis

dateOfDiagnosis[yyyy].ariaLabel: Enter year of the patient’s date of diagnosis
dateOfDiagnosis[yyyy].empty: Enter your patient's year of diagnosis

otherDiagnoses.label: Other relevant diagnoses? (optional)
otherDiagnoses.tooLong: Other relevant diagnoses has a maximum length of 132 characters

patientAware.label: Is the patient aware of their prognosis?
patientAware.labelA11y: Is the patient aware of their prognosis?
patientAware.empty: Select if your patient is aware of their condition

formRequester.label: Who asked you to complete this form?
formRequester.labelA11y: Who asked you to complete this form?
formRequester.empty: Select who asked you to complete this form

representativePostcode.label: Representative postcode
representativePostcode.tooLong: Representative's postcode has a maximum length of 8 characters. Please only include alphabetical and numeric characters and avoid spaces and hyphens

clinicalFeatures.label: Give details of the clinical features that indicate a severe progressive condition.
clinicalFeatures.labelAria: Enter a description of clinical features
clinicalFeatures.hint: For example: the rate of progression, recurrence, staging, tumour markers, CD4 count and viral load, bulbar involvement, respiratory problems, heart failure.
clinicalFeatures.tooLong: Clinical features has a maximum length of 236 characters
clinicalFeatures.wordTooLong: Clinical features must contain words with fewer than 59 characters

treatment.label: Give details of treatments
treatment.ariaLabel: Enter dates and patient's response to treatment
treatment.hint: Including the dates and the patient's response to the treatment.
treatment.labelA11y: Dates and patient's response to the treatment.
treatment.tooLong: Treatment details has a maximum length of 160 characters
treatment.wordTooLong: Treatment must contain words with fewer than 59 characters

otherIntervention.label: Give details of planned future treatments or interventions
otherIntervention.ariaLabel: Enter any interventions or planned treatments
otherIntervention.hint: Including if the planned treatments or interventions could significantly change the progression of the patient's condition.
otherIntervention.labelA11y: If there are any interventions or planned treatments.
otherIntervention.tooLong: Intervention and planned treatment has a maximum length of 120 characters
otherIntervention.wordTooLong: Other interventions must contain words with fewer than 59 characters

gmcNumber.label: Your GMC number
gmcNumber.tooLong: GMC numbers cannot be more than 7 digits long
gmcNumber.tooShort: GMC number must be 7 digits long
gmcNumber.pattern: GMC Numbers can only contain digits which cannot all be zeros

gmcNumberConsultant.label: Your GMC number
gmcNumberConsultant.tooLong: GMC numbers cannot be more than 7 digits long
gmcNumberConsultant.tooShort: GMC number must be 7 digits long
gmcNumberConsultant.pattern: GMC Numbers can only contain digits which cannot all be zeros

declarationAdditionalDetail.label: Please specify
declarationAdditionalDetail.empty: Please specify your relationship to the patient
declarationAdditionalDetail.invalid: Relationship to patient field contains invalid characters
declarationAdditionalDetail.wordTooLong: Please specify field must contain words with fewer than 59 characters

gpAddress.label: Your Trust address
gpAddress.hint: If you are not a part of a Trust, this could be your Clinical Commissioning Group (CCG), Primary Care Trust (PCT) or surgery.

gpPhone.label: Your phone number
gpPhone.invalid: Enter a telephone number, like 01632 960 001, 07700 900 982 or +44 0808 157 0192
gpPhone.pattern: Phone number is not a valid format
